title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item on first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: In the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item on the first attempt. The focus shifts to the library file node in the outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.

OB: When trying to select any item in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

EB: On the second attempt, the label item can be successfully selected.

SR: 
1. Open the application and navigate to the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the library outline view.
3. Observe that the focus jumps to the library file node instead of the selected item.
4. Repeat the selection process, and note that on the second attempt, the item can be successfully selected.
